heading: You will build the roof, calculate the construction materials yourself easily.

banner.title: Hello There
banner.descriptions: Welcome to our website, where you can experience the convenience of accurate roof cost calculation at your fingertips. Whether you're planning a roofing project or looking to estimate the costs involved, our online tool is here to help. Get an instant estimate for your roofing project and simplify the process of calculating your roofing costs. With our user-friendly interface, you can effortlessly plan your roofing budget and make informed decisions. Save time and money by taking advantage of our roofing cost calculator, designed to take the guesswork out of roofing expenses. Know your roofing costs in minutes and gain the confidence to proceed with your project. Join us today and benefit from smart roofing cost calculation made simple.

calculate.title: Calculate now!!
calculate.descriptions: Please fill up all field very carefully. Set values according to units.

result.rodValue: kg (An additional 5-10% wastage will require additional rods)

form.field4: Cement, Sand and Gravel ratio (cement: sand: gravel)
